description: Developed a competitive intelligence framework for a regional real estate client, automating tracking of competitor pricing and market demand signals.
Built a multi-agent AI workflow for a nonprofit healthcare provider, reducing analysis time by 50%.
Architected a unified analytics and reporting platform for a regional telecom provider, consolidating multiple data sources into a single source of truth.
Led consulting engagements across healthcare, telecom, real estate, and nonprofit sectors, delivering executive-level presentations that shaped corporate strategy.
Directed strategic planning for Enrollment Services, International Education, and Alumni Relations.
Conducted market research and data analysis to guide recruitment strategy and alumni engagement.
Led a cross-functional marketing team and managed external vendors.
Delivered reporting frameworks that informed leadership decisions and optimized campaign performance.
Led development of a scalable multi-touch attribution framework combining GA, CRM, and media mix modeling.
Designed and implemented A/B/n and multivariate testing for campaign optimization.
Conducted incrementality tests and causal impact analyses to isolate marketing lift.
Managed a team of analysts and developers, mentoring them in SQL, Python, and statistical modeling.
Built ETL pipelines to consolidate data from Salesforce, Act-On, Google Ads, and programmatic ad platforms.
Created executive dashboards consolidating KPIs for C-suite stakeholders across 20+ enterprise clients.
Led data governance initiatives, standardizing taxonomy and tagging protocols.
Designed customer segmentation models and testing frameworks that improved campaign ROI.
Conducted stakeholder and market research for a higher education institution.
Developed and executed go-to-market strategies for new product launches, contributing to national expansion.
Advised a major retailer on consumer engagement campaigns.
Led digital transformation projects for leisure and recreation organizations.
